sentence: Democratic Senator Raphael Warnock of Georgia was trailing Republican challenger Herschel Walker in an Emerson College poll conducted from April 1 to 3.
author: Darragh Roche
title: Democrats' Midterm Chances Dwindling as Republicans Gain Strength: Polls

sentence: While Herschel Walker easily won the Republican nomination in Georgia on Tuesday, GOP candidates in Arizona, Nevada and New Hampshire are still battling through contested primaries.
title: The gun debate roadblock you might not expect: Swing states
